english.segment1: Can I lie here in Your arms. Can I lie here in Your arms. My only calm is You. Save me
english.segment2: Can I lie here in Your arms. Can I lie here in Your arms. My only thought is You. Save me
english.segment3: Can I lie here in Your arms. Can I lie here in Your arms. My happiness is You. Save me
english.segment4: Oh how lovely this place. To be with You
english.segment6: Oh the brightness of Your face. Here with You. Here with You
english.segment7: Oh my only calm is You. Oh my only thought is You. Oh my happiness is You. Oh my happiness is You
english.segment8: To be with You. To be with You. Save me
